description: under this award 34823 there were seven sub-project activities.  The 37247 being the main one.   Four projects were given advances i.e 37250, 251, 252, 255.

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Demonstrate energy efficiency in steel re-rolling in few units and capacity building
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Efficiency in Steel Rerolling
